title: Grabbing those Cheetos
text: When {0} sends its people, they're not sending their best. They're not sending you. They're sending {1} that have lots of problems, and they're bringing those problems to us. They're bringing {2}. They're bringing {3}. They're {4}. And some, I assume, are good {5}! But I speak to border {6} and they tell us what we're getting. And it only makes common sense. They're sending us not the {7} people. It's coming from more than {0}. It's coming from all over {8}, and it's coming probably from {9}. But we don't know. Because we have no {10} and we have no {11}, we don't know what's {12}. And it's got to stop and it's got to stop fast.
